original_text: I am not speaking of all of you; I know whom I have chosen. But the Scripture will be fulfilled, ‘He who ate my bread has lifted his heel against me.’
korean_text: 내가 너희 모두를 가리켜 말하는 것이 아니니라 나는 내가 택한 자들이 누구인지 앎이라 그러나 내 떡을 먹는 자가 내게 발꿈치를 들었다 한 성경을 응하게 하려는 것이니라

sentences.original_text: I am not speaking of all of you
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너희 전부를 말하는 것이 아니다

sentences.original_text: I know whom I have chosen
But the Scripture will be fulfilled
has lifted his heel against me
